xwikidoc.title: Panels
xwikidoc.content:
1 $msg.get("xe.panels") #if($hasAdmin) 1.1 $msg.get("xe.panels.create") #includeTopic("Panels.CreatePanel") #end 1.1 $msg.get("xe.panels.viewer") #set ($sql = ", BaseObject as obj where obj.name=doc.fullName and obj.className='Panels.PanelClass' and doc.fullName!='Panels.PanelTemplate' order by doc.name") #set($searchResults = $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) #foreach ($item in $searchResults) #set($obj = $xwiki.getDocument($item).getObject("Panels.PanelClass")) #if($obj.type == 'view') * [$item]#if($hasAdmin){pre} [{/pre}$msg.get("edit") $msg.get("delete"){pre}]{/pre}#end: $obj.description #end #end #if($hasAdmin)
$msg.get("xe.panels.customize") [$msg.get("panelwizard.panelwizard")>Panels.PanelWizard].
#end 1.1 $msg.get("xe.panels.editor") #foreach ($item in $searchResults) #set($obj = $xwiki.getDocument($item).getObject("Panels.PanelClass")) #if($obj.type == 'edit') * [$item]#if($hasAdmin){pre} [{/pre}$msg.get("edit") $msg.get("delete"){pre}]{/pre}#end: $obj.description #end #end
